entities.description: Moody had not dropped by headquarters yet

entities.name: headquarters
entities.description: They could not be sure what was inside it

entities.name: drawing room
entities.description: They moved from the drawing room to a dining room on the ground floor

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape might refer to their work as “cleaning,” but in Harry’s opinion they were really waging war on the house

entities.name: house
entities.description: which was putting up a very good fight, aided and abetted by Kreacher

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: The house-elf kept appearing wherever they were congregated
